sections:
12 of the Protection of
Women from Domestic Violence Act
full_text:
IN THE COURT OF THE JUDICIAL I CLASS MAGISTRATE-I
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM.
Present:- Smt. Karthika S Varma
Judicial I Class Magistrate-I, Thiruvananthapuram.
Dated this the 15" day of Janaury, 2025
MC 61/24
Petitioner/Aggrieved 1.Nissa S, aged 36 years, Reshma, TC
Person 48 /570(1), National Nagar, 8-A,
Kallattumukku, Manacadu P O,
Thiruvananthapruam-695009
2.Bismi, aged 16 years, residing at -do -do
(By Adv. Beena S)
Respondent Abdul Jabbar, aged 40 years, Reshma, TC
48/570(1), National Nagar, 8-A,
Kallaattumukku, manacadu P O,
Thiruvananthapuram-695 009
Order MC is disposed of in terms of the Mediation
Agreement. The Mediation Agreement shall
form part of the Order.
This MC having come up for consideration finally on 15.01.2025 and this
Court on the same day passed the following: -
ORDER
2. This MC is filed by the Petitioner herein under Section 12 of the Protection of
Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005 (hereinafter referred to as ‘PWDV Act’)
seeking for various reliefs under the said Act.
3. The averments of the Petitioner in brief is that she has been subjected to acts of
domestic violence in the nature of physical abuse, emotional and verbal abuse and
economic abuse by the Respondent.
4. On issuance of process, the Respondent entered appearance. The parties were
referred for mediation on their request on 21.10.24 and the matter got settled
between the parties on the basis of Mediation Agreement dated 22.11.24. Perused the
terms of Mediation Agreement. Heard both sides on the terms. This Court is satisfied

that the terms of Mediation Agreement are lawful. and therefore this MC is disposed

of in terms of the Mediation Agreement. The Mediation Agreement shall form part

of the Order.

5. In the result, this MC is disposed of in terms of the Mediation Agreement. The

Mediation Agreement shall form part of the Order.

(Dictated to the CA, transcribed and typed by her, corrected and revised by

me and pronounced in open court on this the 15" day of January 2025)
Judicial Magistrate of First Class -I,

Thiruvananthapuram
